mapper.select: select uid, text, comment, creator, create_time, update_time from paraphrase WHERE uid = #{uid}

select uid, text, comment, creator, create_time, update_time from paraphrase WHERE 1 = 1
and text like '%#{condition}%'
ORDER by case when update_time is null then create_time else update_time end desc

select t.time, t.count as `increment`, sum(t.count) over( order by t.time) as total from ( select count(1) `count`, DATE_FORMAT(create_time , '%Y-%m-%d') `time` from paraphrase w group by time order by time ) t
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM paraphrase_group_dtl WHERE group_id = #{groupId} and paraphrase_id=#{paraphraseId};
